long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Supported in DevOps Test UI 11.0.0 and future releases.

DevOps Test UI for Google Chrome™

DevOps Test UI is an object-oriented automated functional testing tool that tests applications based on HTML, Java, Microsoft Windows and numerous other technologies.

With this DevOps Test UI extension for Google Chrome, you can test HTML applications that are loaded in the Google Chrome browser on Windows and Linux operating systems with tests built in traditional programming languages like Java and VB. You may customize the port number for the web server that is used for automation thru extension options.

While testing browser based applications, DevOps Test UI maybe integrated with many of the CI/CD environments.
long.cs,de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,pl,pt_BR,ru,tr,z:
DevOps Test UI for Google Chrome™

DevOps Test UI is an object-oriented automated functional testing tool that tests HTML, Java, Microsoft Windows, Microsoft .NET, Microsoft Visual Basic, Microsoft Silverlight, Eclipse, SAP, Siebel, Adobe Flex, Ajax, Dojo, GEF and Sybase PowerBuilder applications. You can also test Adobe PDF documents, and IBM zSeries®, IBM iSeries®, and IBM pSeries® applications.

With DevOps Test UI, you can test HTML applications that are loaded in Google Chrome browsers in Microsoft Windows environments.

You can use the DevOps Test UI for Google Chrome™ extension to change the port number for the web server that is used when testing applications loaded in Google Chrome browsers.

DevOps Test UI can be integrated with IBM® Rational® Quality Manager. You can execute functional test scripts from IBM Rational Quality Manager.
